title: Drawing, "Design for Hebrew Text for Ark Curtain, Beth Am Synagogue, Los Altos, California", 1968–69
medium: Brush and brown and red-brown watercolor, black ink on white paper, ruled in graphite
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite on verso along left and right edges with short, ruled lines at 1 inch intervals.
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: Life size cartoon of partial Hebrew text in three lines with large Hebrew letter at upper left.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Hebrew Text for Ark Curtain, Beth Am Synagogue, Los Altos, California", 1968–69.
1968–69. Brush and brown and red-brown watercolor, black ink on white paper, ruled in graphite. Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives. 1993-121-73-f.
